mapper.select: select b.batch_name,c.class_id,cs.courses_name,uu.user_name,ds.departments_name from user u left join user uu on u.departments_id=uu.departments_id left join userrole ur on uu.user_id=ur.user_id left join role r on r.role_id=ur.role_id left join teach t on t.user_id=uu.user_id left join courses cs on cs.courses_id=t.courses_id left join papers ps on ur.role_id=ps.role_id left join batch b on b.batch_id=ps.batch_id left join class c on c.class_id=t.class_id left join departments ds on uu.departments_id=ds.departments_id where u.user_id=#{user_id} and u.user_id!=uu.user_id and r.role_name="教师"
